import React from "react"; import { Card,CardBody } from "reactstrap"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './TourCard.css' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id,title,city,photo,price,featured,avgRating,reviews} = tour return
Featured
{city} {avgRating} ({reviews.length})
{title}
Rs{price} /Per Person
; }; export default TourCard;
